Text: Any chance youll have something for me today

ConEd Lakewood PeakerHarry Got the bid documents for ConEds offering of peaking capacity for PJM East Lakewood New Jersey Cant imagine they would entertain an Enron bid right now without confiscatory credit pricing Do you want to bid anyway Let me know

REThanks a heap Will be waiting with baited breath Hope you had a nice vacation Original Message From Arora Harry Sent Thursday November PM To Blair Greg Subject RE Hi Greg I was out on vaca for last week Am back Monday Will be happy to put numbers on all this stuff Harry Original Message From Blair Greg Sent Mon PM To Arora Harry Cc Subject Harry Are you still alive

Various OffersHarry Do you think youll have a chance to work on the various offers today ie Dominion TVA ConEd If not could you give me an idea of when this week you think youll have some time Thanks Greg

Indicative Pricing for Dominion ResourcesHi All Just got off the phone with the folks Dominion regarding some indicative pricing I gave them last week for i a Heat Rate Call in TVA and ii a Heat Rate Call in SERC FYI I had quoted the TVA Call KWmo over our mid for a yr call beginning with VOM and x avail with hr mins I also quoted the SERC call at over our mid at KWmo for yr and KWmo for yrs again with x and hour mins The good news is this pricing generated some interest The other not bad news is they want us to refine our quotes in some respects For the SERC calls theyre really interested in the new RTO GridSouth Harry we need to see if we can identify a product today for what GridSouth will be tomorrow In addition they are really interested in something more akin to a true synthetic with intraday availability say hour notice with or hour mins Since they are going to compare this to a real plant I think we can take some latitude in calculating the VOM for shorter dispatch periods since they would otherwise experience a start charge which would be spread over fewer hours Let me know what you think we can do We should probably talk about this On the TVA call theyre happy with the quote I gave them but would like the flexibility of hour mins Let talk about this as well I told them that size on the TVA would be in the range of They will check size on their side and Id like us to affirm if this works for us as well They would also like to see a Peaker Call in TVA with a June start yr term hour notice hour mins priced for JunAug and DecMar availability Theyll get back to me on size In the meantime lets talk about what were interested in Sorry about the length of this message If I dont hear from you in an hour or so Ill initiate the call My NY number is

RE ConEd Lakewood New Jersey Synthetic PeakerThe exact location is Lakewood LMP There is a substation at Lakewood Plant location is miles south of New York City on an exit ramp of the Garden State Parkway To my knowledge the existing plant is not interconnected to NY In any event pricing would be for PJM East Original Message From Arora Harry Sent Monday November PM To Blair Greg Cavazos Brandon Subject RE ConEd Lakewood New Jersey Synthetic Peaker What is the exact location in terms of LMP is this a PJM east or PJM west hub Is it connected to NY either Zone G or Zone J Original Message From Blair Greg Sent Monday November PM To Cavazos Brandon Cc Arora Harry Subject RE ConEd Lakewood New Jersey Synthetic Peaker Brandon and Harry Brandon I assume the pricing is at the mids Also since the spread between the VOM and the VOM is so small Ill just quote the Harry Please look at the entire email thread to get a sense of all the metrics were employing for this quote ConEd has already announced a xFA peaker configuration for Lakewood NJ The site is already owned by ConEd part of an existing MW combined cycle plant they already own Its on the same transmission line running to the south as the Oyster Creek nuclear facility which has a license expiration in The existing plant is a nonmerchant EWG selling MW to JCPL pusuant to a twentyyear PPA expiring in ConEd has put out an RFP to sell MW of the peaking capacity from this planned facility They planned to have the unit operational by June If we provide this synthetic toll the plant construction would be deferred Let me know if we can do to MW and lets talk about appropriate spreads above the mids Also please be mindful of their desire for hour mins Thanks Original Message From Cavazos Brandon Sent Monday November PM To Blair Greg Cc Hiemstra Nick Subject FW ConEd Lakewood New Jersey Synthetic Peaker Pricing as follows For the year option VOM VOM For the year option VOM VOM As always these prices are indicative For a product of that size MW I would probe the customer to find a breakevencost of construction price and approach Harry to get the risk premium Let me know how it works out Brandon Cavazos Enron North America Smith Street Houston TX Original Message From Blair Greg Sent Monday November PM To Cavazos Brandon Subject ConEd Lakewood New Jersey Synthetic Peaker Brandon Got another one What MW Peaker Where Lakewood NJ in PJM about miles south of NYC off the Garden State Parkway Look on a road atlas to get the location right for LMP pricing Heat Rate VOM Price it two ways MWh and MWh Gas Transco Zone Non New York Avail x year round day ahead dispatch w hour minimums Start Date June Term years show me years also please Call me if you have questions Thanks much

Dominion OpportunitiesHarry Iris and Brandon Just finished up another call with my counterparty at Dominion Here are the opportunities GridSouth They really want to dump in CPL East anything we can do to facilitate this will better meet customer requirements Capacity MW MW MW for five years Will accept dayahead dispatch Really want hour minimum runs w x availability Heat Rate VOM MWh Entergy They want a straight x day power purchase fixed price Capacity MW Start Date July Term Years Price xMWh TVA Peaker Really want intraday call whr notice for hr minimum run time Capacity Tell me what if any we can do Start Date June Availability x JuneAug DecMar Heat Rate VOM MWh Lets really try to see if we can do the intraday If absolutely not available for hr min run time see if we can do hr min If this is absolutely not possible lets try to quote dayahead hr min at the very least TVA Combined Cycle This one we already quoted at KWmo for year x call beginning for Heat Rate VOM This was for dayahead hr min run time Tell me how much the price changes if we reduce min run time from hrs to hrs Please call me in NY to discuss if you have any questions Thanks for all your work I think we have a real opportunity here if we can respond positively on a few fronts Regards Greg

ConEd Lakewood Deal PJM EastHarry Iris and Brandon I asked ConEd if they were prepared to hear our OFFER to buy peaking capacity from the Lakewood expansion They are in the midst of preparing a draft term sheet for purchasing the outputtolling so well have to wait to see the parameters of sale I also asked if they would like to see PJM WEST synthetic toll offer from us Unfortunately NO To the extent it matters the online date is now set for late so they would like to see our offer for a Jan start date Given that these guys are doing a real comparison against bricks and mortar we would be looking at a million option premium for MW KWmo over a threeyear term million for a fouryear term I would hope we could be able to find a way to hedge the risk of too many hours killing us Is there any cap we could buy to protect our downside risk here and still make this deal attractive The heat rate call is struck at

RE Dominion OpportunitiesI fully understand Were dealing with some unprecedented uncertainties here Just want to make sure we keep on top of opportunities on the assumption we all pull out of this mess All the best Greg Original Message From Arora Harry Sent Thu PM To Blair Greg Cc Subject RE Dominion Opportunities Greg There has been just too many rumors flying around here to quote real long term deals Give me a day or so to put numbers on long dated deals Harry Original Message From Blair Greg Sent Wednesday November PM To Arora Harry Subject FW Dominion Opportunities Harry Any idea when youll get a chance to respond to these questions Id like to get back to my counterparties ASAP Understand youre probably very busy Just give me an estimate if you can Regards Greg Original Message From Blair Greg Sent Tuesday November AM To Arora Harry Mack Iris Cavazos Brandon Subject Dominion Opportunities Harry Iris and Brandon Just finished up another call with my counterparty at Dominion Here are the opportunities GridSouth They really want to dump in CPL East anything we can do to facilitate this will better meet customer requirements Capacity MW MW MW for five years Will accept dayahead dispatch Really want hour minimum runs w x availability Heat Rate VOM MWh Entergy They want a straight x day power purchase fixed price Capacity MW Start Date July Term Years Price xMWh TVA Peaker Really want intraday call whr notice for hr minimum run time Capacity Tell me what if any we can do Start Date June Availability x JuneAug DecMar Heat Rate VOM MWh Lets really try to see if we can do the intraday If absolutely not available for hr min run time see if we can do hr min If this is absolutely not possible lets try to quote dayahead hr min at the very least TVA Combined Cycle This one we already quoted at KWmo for year x call beginning for Heat Rate VOM This was for dayahead hr min run time Tell me how much the price changes if we reduce min run time from hrs to hrs Please call me in NY to discuss if you have any questions Thanks for all your work I think we have a real opportunity here if we can respond positively on a few fronts Regards Greg

TVA Synthetic Peaker Cc Harry and Brandon Just to memorialize what I just communicated to Harry over the phone My interface at TVA emailed yesterday requesting a phone dialogue to discuss where our Synthetic Peaker offer needs to be for TVA to execute Holding all assumptions constant we would need to come in between KWmonth in order for TVA to execute Our indicative quote was KWmonth I will attempt to find out if they have other offers in the sub range or if they are just setting their own bid at the requested price
Dominion ConEd and TVAHarry If youre done polishing up your resume only kidding would you let me know when I can expect to hear back on the various emails on the subject company offers Thanks

Various OffersHarry Do you think youll have a chance to work on the various offers today ie Dominion TVA ConEd If not could you give me an idea of when this week you think youll have some time Thanks Greg

REThanks a heap Will be waiting with baited breath Hope you had a nice vacation Original Message From Arora Harry Sent Thursday November PM To Blair Greg Subject RE Hi Greg I was out on vaca for last week Am back Monday Will be happy to put numbers on all this stuff Harry Original Message From Blair Greg Sent Mon PM To Arora Harry Cc Subject Harry Are you still alive
